meanings.definition: A group of toxic chemical compounds that are persistent environmental pollutants.
meanings.sent1: The dioxins in the soil can harm animals and plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of dioxins on human health.
meanings.sent3: The dioxins decided to have a party in the river, but no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The dioxins spread through the air like a dark cloud of danger.
meanings.sent5: The dioxins lurked in the shadows, waiting to cause harm.

meanings.definition: Any of several toxic polychlorinated dibenzo-p-dioxins.
meanings.sent1: She learned about the different types of dioxins in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The factory released dioxins into the water supply, causing concern among residents.
meanings.sent3: The dioxins at the party were the most toxic guests.
meanings.sent4: His words were like dioxins, poisoning the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The dioxins glowed ominously in the darkness of the forest.
